conditions.name: Like New
conditions.desc: Your equipment is in the condition as if you have just bought it.

conditions.name: Excellent
conditions.desc: The item may have some small cosmetic blemishes that lower its grade.

conditions.name: Very Good
conditions.desc: Your item may have some cosmetic wear to the paintwork.

conditions.name: Good
conditions.desc: Equipment is showing more obvious signs of cosmetic wear.

conditions.name: Well Used
conditions.desc: Your equipment will be showing significant signs of wear.

shipping.name: DPD Pickup Shop
shipping.desc: Drop your parcel off to any local DPD store (to find your nearest eligible store enter your post code below)

shipping.name: DPD Home Collection
shipping.desc: Have your parcel collected from your doorstep Mon-Fri (excluding bank holidays) on a nominated day.

shipping.name: Come to Park Camera
shipping.desc: Visit one of our pro stores to complete your trade in, with the help from our friendly staff.

front.title: Like New
front.description: Equipment should be 'as new' and free from any signs of cosmetic wear. This includes the rear screens on cameras and the glass elements on lenses.

front.title: Excellent
front.description: Your equipment should be close to being 'Like New' but it has small cosmetic blemishes to the exterior.

front.title: Very Good
front.description: There will be signs of wear and tear to your equipment. Any cosmetic wear should not affect the performance.

front.title: Good
front.description: Equipment will have obvious signs of wear to several areas.

front.title: Well Used
front.description: Your equipment will have significant signs of wear.

side.title: Very Good
side.description: There will be signs of wear and tear to your equipment. Any cosmetic wear should not affect the performance.

side.title: Good
side.description: Equipment will have obvious signs of wear to several areas.

side.title: Well Used
side.description: Your equipment will have significant signs of wear.
